title: Programming Legalese MCP
description: Machine Coded Principle for our programming legalese and structured development standards.

principles.name: Highly Structured JavaScript for Type Annotation
principles.description: Our programming legalese, characterized by highly structured JavaScript, inherently annotates type through its consistent and explicit structural patterns. This approach ensures clarity, predictability, and facilitates static analysis.
benefits: Clearer communication of data structures and interfaces
